front.title: Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) Client Update Protocol (LCUP)

abstract.t: This document defines the Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) Client Update Protocol (LCUP). The protocol is intended to allow an LDAP client to synchronize with the content of a directory information tree (DIT) stored by an LDAP server and to be notified about the changes to that content.
